transform.expr: 'M ' + group1Width + ' '  + scale('y', datum.name) + ' L '+ scale('x', 0) + ' '+ scale('yInner', datum.name) + ' L ' + scale('x', 0) + ' '  + (scale('yInner', datum.name)+bandwidth('yInner'))  + ' L  ' + group1Width + ' '  + (scale('y', datum.name)+bandwidth('y'))

'M ' + (scale('x', datum.speed)) + ' ' +  scale('yInner', datum.name) + ' L ' +  (scale('x', datum.speed)+bandwidth('yInner')/2) +' ' + (scale('yInner', datum.name)+ bandwidth('yInner')/2)  +' L ' + (scale('x', datum.speed)) + ' ' + (scale('yInner', datum.name)+ bandwidth('yInner'))
